entry.title: 3M 94-1QT - Tape Primer 94 1 Quart Bulk 7000001584
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Tape Primers
Price: 47.81

[shortdesc]

3M Tape Primer, 94, 1 quart

  • 3M™ Tape Primer 94 can be used to improve the overall adhesion of tape, film and vinyl graphics to polyethylene, polypropylene, ABS, PET/PBT blends, concrete, wood, glass, metal and painted metal surfaces.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Tape Primers

    Extra Product Information

  • 3M™ Tape Primer 94 helps to significantly improve initial and ultimate adhesion to many materials such as plastics and paints because of their low surface energy or the additives they may contain
  • A primer creates a new surface for 3M™ VHB™ Tape to adhere

    • Product Information

  • Promotes adhesion to polyethylene, polypropylene, ABS, PET/PBT (polymer and plastic) blends and other difficult to stick to substrates
  • Commonly used for increasing adhesion of film and vinyl graphics in automotive detailing
  • Can be applied with brush or swab for small areas and a pressurized flow gun for larger areas
  • Dries to a clear finish
  • Cleans up with isopropyl alcohol

    • Suggested Application

  • General industrial
    		•

entry.title: 3M 6013 - Scuff-It Paint Prep Gel 0 24.7 Oz. (700 G) 7000120478
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Primers
Price: 29.15

[shortdesc]

3M Scuff-It Paint Prep Gel, 06013, 24.7 oz. (700 g)

  • 3M™ Scuff-It Paint Prep Gel, 06013, is designed to clean, degrease and abrade automotive surfaces prior to painting
  • Used with Scotch-Brite™ Hand Pads, the 3M™ Scuff-it Paint Prep Gel lubricates the pad to ensure a consistent scratch pattern that helps to improve adhesion of paint.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Application Surface Preparation
    Color White
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Primers
    Volume 16 oz

    Extra Product Information

  • Used in conjunction with Scotch-Brite™ hand pads, the Scuff-It™ gel lubricates the pad to ensure a consistent scratch pattern that will greatly improve the adhesion of the paint
  • Rinses cleanly with water
  • Convenient "wedge" tube fits into technician's po

    • Product Information

  • Cleans, degreases and abrades in one easy step
  • Clings to panels and other vertical surfaces
  • Wedge tube fits in back pocket
  • Leaves a uniform key-way cut
  • To be used with gray, gold, or white Scotch-Brite products
  • Preps plastic and rubber parts.
  • Cleans and preps around tight-fitting trim and moldings.
  • Helps to increase productivity.
  • Helps to improve paint adhesion 30 -40%.
  • Produces uniform scratch patterns.
  • Rinses cleanly with water
  • Convenient Inchwedge Inch tube fits into technician's pocket for easy use.

    • Suggested Application

  • Designed to be a one-step cleaning and degreasing agent for panel preparation
  • Can be used for blending areas, feathering primer and paint, cleaning and prepping jambs and areas around tight-fitting trim and moldings
    		•
